Solution of heat equation using Crank Nicolson method


u_t = 4*u_xx

u(0,t) = u(8,t)=0
u(x,0) = 4*x - (x**2)/2

The effect of alpha is observed in how quickly the diffusion takes place.
Linalg module (from numpy) has been used for matrix inversion
